topics.body:
It's official; I hate my fucking family.

So we had a big fucking argument last night.  To make it short they think I should BUY a house after working somewhere for a week and their exact wording was "maybe you should look at permanently getting a house?"  This morning I got screamed at cause they know their point is utterly indefensible cause how the flying fuck are you supposed to drop 100k on a house for a job you have been only working at for one week?  They didn't even defend their point; it was just straight up screaming.

You know someone is immature when someone asks you how your point is even possible and you respond with screaming.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54da016763687201eb8a0300#post_54da016763687201eb8a0300
You know it's hard to believe you came from them. A person with your intellect cannot be from a family of idiots.

Or mayhaps you absorbed all their intelligence and what's left is that. Like a brain vampire.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
And now I got into a argument with them over something my boss wants printed out this morning.  Short version is that I was told that my boss wants me to print out a paper saying that he wants employees to wash their hands; I responded with "A letter won't look professional because I don't have all the fonts and such yet so the letter won't look nearly as good"  "I DON'T NEED A LONG EXPLANATION ABOUT LETTERS OR SUCH!  YOUR BOSS JUST WANTS YOU TO DO IT!"  "A letter is another word for a piece of paper"  "oh.  WELL I DON'T NEED A LONG TECHNICAL EXPLANATION OF YOUR JOB OR SUCH!  YOUR BOSS JUST WANTS YOU TO DO IT!"  *facepalm*


I don't mean to sound rude, BUT
!http://24.media.tumblr.com/322927b846a16a9d5dc52912e59ac5d7/tumblr_n39dk8XNNX1tq4of6o1_500.gif!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
